'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
The heart of the pirate operation at [[Fort Deadlight]], containing the main hall, shrine, and other necessary facilities.

==Points of interest==
* The main hall is where [[Mirke]] and [[Syri the Siren]] are located, together with a harpsichord you can rig to get rid of [[Benweth]]. 
* Access to the back is strictly limited. You can sneak in or go through [[Deadlight dungeon]] to reach the forge, getting [[Lamond]]'s crew out of the slammer first.
* There's a shrine to Skaen in the northeast - pilfer [[Entonia Signet Ring]] from a hidden skull there. Otherwise, you can head to the docks through the kitchen or straight to [[Deadlight donjon]] up the stairs.

==Characters==
* [[Mirke]], a sidekick.
* [[Syri the Siren]], an orlan pirate, [[Serafen]]'s contact and ''"some random lover"'' of his.
* [[Lamond]], in the forge.
* [[Sceydwin]], in the forge.

==Loot==
* [[Entonia Signet Ring]]: In the shrine to Skaen, requires [[Perception]] 11 to detect.
